org.springframework.shell.table

Class BorderSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.shell.table.BorderSpecification

  • public class BorderSpecification
extends Object
    This represents a directive to set some borders on cells of a table. Multiple specifications can be combined on a single table.
